de.uniulm.omi.cloudiator.sword.domain

Interface VirtualMachine

  • All Superinterfaces:
    de.uniulm.omi.cloudiator.domain.Identifiable, LocationScoped, de.uniulm.omi.cloudiator.domain.Named, ProviderIdentifiable, Resource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VirtualMachineImpl, VirtualMachineMultiCloudImpl

    public interface VirtualMachine
extends Resource
    Represents a virtual machine.

    • Method Detail

      • publicAddresses

        Set<String> publicAddresses()
        The public ip addresses under which this virtual machine is reachable.
        Returns:
        an immutable set of ip addresses.

      • privateAddresses

        Set<String> privateAddresses()
        The private up addresses assigned to the virtual machine.
        Returns:
        an immutable set of up addresses.

        The HardwareFlavor used for creating the virtual machine.
        Returns:

      • loginCredential

        Optional<LoginCredential> loginCredential()
        Optional login credentials.

        The login credentials are normally only available if the machine was just created.

        Returns:
        optional login credentials.
